item.title: Finest apochromatic refractor telescope available today.
Takahashi TOA-150 Apo refractor
item.description:
Takahashi TOA-150 Apo refractor

The TOA-150 is available either the tube itself (OTA) or complete configuration. In spite of its size and its weight, this refractor can be used as an itinerant mode, particularly when it is associated with the EM-400 equatorial mount. This will allow the end-user to take advantage of the best night skies.

item.title: Takahashi TSA-120 refractor
item.description:
Takahashi TSA-120 refractor

TSA-120 features the specifications of the TSA-102S : an apochromatic objective with triplet ED, a retractable dew-shield, great mechanics and versatility of use, both visual and photographic. Moreover, TSA-120 is extremely light, it weights only 6.7 kg. Even when TSA-120 is fully equipped for CCD imaging, EM-200 will easily holds it.

item.title: Takahashi TSA-102 refractor
item.description:
Takahashi TSA-102 refractor

The Takahashi TSA-102 refractor has became the worthy heiress of the mythical FS-102. The apochromatic objective of 102mm of aperture (F/8) forsook its classical optical design with Fluorite doublet for a ED triplet set in a simple barrel, whose results are quite as flattering.

item.title: Takahashi SKY-90 refractor
item.description:
Takahashi SKY-90 refractor

The SKY-90 is the ideal compromise between a wide-field astrograph and general-purpose observation refractor. Its great compactness makes it an excellent companion for the itinerant astrophotographer. Equipped with an apochromatic objective with Fluorite doublet of 90mm of aperture (F/5.6), it constitutes an unequalled optics for those wishing to have a transportable and general-purpose telescope, of a frightening effectiveness.
